description: Are you a fan of word games? We have something for you! The best crossword game thats 100% English!  Do you love crosswords and puzzles? Cant imagine a day without a game such as word search and snack?   If thats the case, you will surely like our new crossword game  Wordmania! This game combines the best features of both word master games (jigsaw, snack) and classic paper games  these are certainly the best crosswords in English.  Each word on the board crosses another word, so you can find the right word from the letters arranged in a circle. By dragging between the letters, you create words and arrange them on the board so that they form a cross with already existing words in a crossword. The crossword will be complete when each word is the right one.  But its not that simple! From time to time, the player needs to take part in another word game: a word search. Its rules are simple  there are hidden words surrounded by random letters  you have to find them in the word search before the time runs out and arrange them into a cross on the board  otherwise you will run out of time, the puzzle will disappear and you will have to go for a picnic, thinking about a lost game  and its all going to happen because of this word game.  A lot of attention has been paid to the variety of puzzles  surely many masters of words will appreciate the riddles used for hints  these puzzles are true English crosswords. Stop tearing pages from your notebook to play games like hangman. Our word game is much more addictive, you can solve the puzzles and in peace and quiet without killing the trees!  Play today! If you know every word by heart, dont worry  you can expect regular and often updates! The best puzzles in English only from Simplicity Games.
